task.title: How to Sign a PDF
task.shortdesc: This task explains how to sign your PDFs so that they appear certified by your company.

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

prereq.p:
The following Bouncy Castle libraries have been downloaded (in their last available version):
bcpkix-jdk18on
bcprov-jdk18on
bcutil-jdk18on

step.cmd: Install an external Oxygen PDF Chemistry processor

info.note: A separate installation is required to include the additional libraries.

step.cmd: Create a keystore file (if you do not already have one - see the Oxygen PDF Chemistry User Guide to create one)
Set the keystore file as value for chemistry.sign.keystore parameter
If the keystore uses an export password, set it as chemistry.sign.password value
If you need to add more information (such as your company name) you can set the others chemistry.sign.* parameters
Set the external Oxygen PDF Chemistry path as value for css.processor.path.chemistry
